PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

To download content to the Memory Stick PRO Duo™ of your PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) system, the free space required is twice the size of the content to be downloaded.

This software is playable for PLAYSTATION®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).

To download this software, you must also have at least 230MB of free space on your PLAYSTATION®3 system's hard disk.
To play this software with your PSP®, the latest system software and a Memory Stick Duo™ with at least 230MB of free space are required.
For more detail information about download to your PSP® system, please see below URL.

http://asia.playstation.com

When downloading using PC:
When downloading contents to PSP®, you must install the PLAYSTATION®Network Downloader application first. Please go to our official website for installing instructions and other information.

??

?Game description
This monumental title marks the first collaboration between BANPRESTO and Takiya Iijima, the director of the PlayStation®2 game titled Shiju-Hatchi, released in fall 2007. The game is best categorized as an adventure game in the sound novel format. The main character hears one scary tales at a time from six storytellers, experiencing each one firsthand. A multi-scenario, multi-ending system is employed so that a scary ending no one could possibly predict results, depending on the main character's decisions! The game's story changes according to the order you listen to the storytellers, the choices you make, and the gender of the main character. There is even a hidden scenario that only appears when special conditions are satisfied.
Infinite horror awaits.
Now, let the tales of horror begin.


?PS3™ HDD and Memory Stick™ capacity requirement
230MB
